website_summaries.verdict: Can't decide between silicone or stainless steel? You don't have to with this variety pack.
pros: Combination of silicone and stainless steel straws
Storage bag and cleaning tools included
A variety of colors to choose from
Straws fit easily into takeout cups
Silicone straws are flexible and easy to store in lunch boxes
cons: Not quite long enough for a 30 oz

customer_reviews.title: Environment friendly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reusable silicone and metal straw set to help the environment, by stop using plastic straws. My husband was ecstatic when I showed this to him, he doesn’t like to drink off glasses in restaurants, but also feels terrible for using plastic straws all the time. The quality is great and I highly recommend this set, will make sure to buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kawaii halstead

customer_reviews.title: Reusable straws at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of going to restaurants and having to ask for a straw. I understand that straws are bad for the environment if they are not properly recycled. I then took a look at reusable straws but they were so expensive. Then I found these and they work great. I don’t need medical grade steel or bamboo I just need a straw that works.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these straws, I thought I would be using the stainless steel ones. These are nice but COLD if I am drinking an iced beverage. So I am using the silicon ones. These are great to use and color coded if more than one person using straws. They are super easy to clean with the brushes provided and easily rinse clean. They are soft and flexible which make them easy to roll up and carry in my purse - but they do NOT collapse when you suck on them - even with thicker beverages. I am a fan!
customer_reviews.author: shooter

customer_reviews.title: Not for use with 20oz or larger tumblers.
customer_reviews.text: These are good straws depending on what you want to use them for. If you want to use them for a tumbler, don’t buy these because they will be too short. If you are wanting to replace disposable straws at home for your kids, these are great! I have included a photo of the straw that came with my 20oz tumbler so that you can see the difference in size. The quality of the product is good, the description is not indicative of the actual size if the straw.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me and My Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Love my Straws!! Saving the World One Straw at A Time!!!
customer_reviews.text: In lieu of every restaurant trying to do their part to save the turtles and the earth restaurants are going green which is fine but with the use of paper straws in liquid doesn't work ( you have to drink fast) !!!! So I ordered my first set of plastic straws (which I love) to carry with me.... to still do my part to save turtles and the earth and lessens my footprint (of waste) :) The straws are very vibrant in color, soft, flexible and easy to store away and quick to use. They are great..TRY THEM-ORDER YOURS TODAY!!! THIS company sell them at great price, other companies sale them for close to $20....:(
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA

customer_reviews.title: Save the Planet!  Use These Straws
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the straws. They are dishwasher safe and can be cut to fit any travel cup. I love the little canvas bag as I put them in my briefcase and all my straws stay clean. I am going to buy these as Christmas stocking stuffers this year for all my family and friends. What a great way to save the planet and not be wasteful. Loved them!
customer_reviews.author: WilburJay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product and quick shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient straws. I like to keep these in my purse in the handy little storage bag that’s included. The straws come in very vibrant colors that are appealing. I was worried about them being flemsy because they were plastic. I was wrong, they ate really top quality material and seem to be very sturdy. The package also came with a couple of brushes to help clean the insides of the straws. I noticed many other brands did not include those cleaning brushes. Overall great product, quick shipping and very useful and great for the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Mp6831

customer_reviews.title: Great, eco friendly, straws♡
customer_reviews.text: In my quest to be more earth friendly i have done away with disposable straws and invested in stainless straws.... until I bumped one into my tooth and damn near knocked it out! Ouch.... so I got silicone tips.... much better but a hassle and another thing to clean or loose.... until I saw these silicone straws! These are GREAT! As easy to clean as the stainless but without the fear of chipping a tooth, phew! And they came in bright beautiful colors! Works great for my curved 30oz.... I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Stevizilla

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my grandkids
customer_reviews.text: With kids everything they use regularly has to be sturdy so that’s very important for reusable straws. The straws are holding up nicely they’ve had them for over a month now and still they have held up. They are easy to clean and I don’t remember if the description said anything about dishwasher safe but my daughter and I have been putting them in the silverware basket in the dishwasher and they are fine. My grandkids and I are so pleased I got them these.
customer_reviews.author: derl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for straws for a personalized tumbler I had made bit couldn't find any in our local stores. I ran accross these on a facebook advertisement post. After giving it a quick look i decided to purchase and i am glad i did. It's exactly what I need and jusy the right lenght for my cup. I am really happy with how it arrived packaged and that it included a carrying/storage bag as well as cleaning brushes. I did not care much for the metal straws but that's personal preference as i have a habot of chewing on my straws. Overall quite happy with my purchase and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MsMonyReads

customer_reviews.title: Loved the metal straws, and the cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these straws, however, I use a lot of ice, so I need my straws to be really sturdy. The metal straws are great. They are a bit short for the glass that I usually use, but it is a VERY tall metal cup, so that was to be expected. I love the concept of the silicone straws, but for me they fall short. They fit perfectly in the glass, but they are so flexible, you can't maneuver them around ice cubes. In all honesty though, this was a great price just for the metal straws and the straw cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: KimberDawn

customer_reviews.title: Nice and reusable, question cleanliness. Difficult to get into some travel mugs e
customer_reviews.text: Great that you can wash them but not exactly sure how clean they are given the material. It's just too spongy like. It asks about sturdiness however I don't think they're intended to be sturdy in terms of stiffness because they're very flexible but they do not tear. What I don't care for is that they are so flexible that I have difficulty getting them into the holes of some taller travel mugs. I will use these sometimes but prefer the stainless steel one that I bought after this
customer_reviews.author: Catwell

customer_reviews.title: Holds Flavor of whatever youre drinking
customer_reviews.text: These are good affordable straws. I thought they would be thicker silicone and thicker diameter but they are fine. The colors are cute and vibrant! They do hold the flavor of whatever you drink for a surprisingly long time. I drank a watermelon margarita out of one and cleaned it several times after and now it still has a watermelon taste when I drink water. Im sure you could get rid of the taste with some lemon salt and vinegar but I don't mind it much.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Use with hot or cold liquids no funny taste
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the straw at work the last few days and I really like it. I use it with warm to hot water. I of course washed it before using and I do not taste anything out of the ordinary and I'm using the little scrub cleaning tool included it cleans fast and easy. I opted to go with the blue one because it compliments the picture on my mug that my nephew colored and I'm sure if I use a different mode I will switch colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good straws
customer_reviews.text: So, I've had these straws for a few weeks now. I've only used one which I've reused over and over again because it's easy to clean. I've been using a silicone straw, and I've used it for teas, juice, and smoothies. I like that the material is flexible but durable, and I've used it for tall mugs and shorter glasses. And had no issues between hot and cold beverages I saw that this company donates the proceeds from my order to a nonprofit dedicated to preserving the oceans if I leave feedback and greatly appreciate the gesture.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Reusable straws are a must
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors! Trying to save those turtles one at a time by reducing the straw use. I keep one in my car, one in my backpack, and one in my other bag for work. The rest are at home. Most often I use straws when going to get drinks or fast food somewhere so keeping one in my car is nice! I like the silicone ones as I tend to bite my straws but the metal ones are also nice as well because it seems to make drinks even cooler temperature. Everyone buy these. They’re just fun to have
customer_reviews.author: Marron

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable straws
customer_reviews.text: Silicone straws are nice thickness compared to other brand I've tried. Colors are nice but not quite as bright as pictured. The cleaning brushes are longer than those that I got with the other brand as well. I'd recommend these straws and would buy again if/when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Weird taste that doesn’t go away with time
customer_reviews.text: No. These had a really funky taste and are sorta like trying to drink from a limp noodle. Nice that they include a cleaning brush, but no matter how many times I cleaned them that funky taste wouldn’t go away. Also, I gave my daughter the pink ones one of them tore when she was cleaning it. Try another brand unless you like a little extra flavor in your drink.
customer_reviews.author: M Deep23

customer_reviews.title: Nice straws and work pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: We like these straws yet they do not work well when it comes to lids that have tight straw holes or when drinking milkshakes. When it comes to those issues, the straws tend to collapse before liquid flows. For normal liquids and glasses, they are great! Kids use them for their milk, juice, water, etc with no problems. Yet when it comes to milkshakes or lids that have tight straw holes, we need to revert to the metal ones. Overall we are pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Fry

customer_reviews.title: I can clean them in the dishwasher!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for to reduce the amount of plastic straws I use. They are easy to clean and I've been using them with smoothies at home. The cleaning brushes that come with them work great, but I knew if I couldn't put them in the dishwasher, I would be lazy with them. Now I carry half of them in my bag so I always have some with me. Very happy, hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy D

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES straws (she’s 2), and these were the perfect stocking stuffer. She loves picking out all the bright colors, and the silicone ones are very durable. She also likes the stainless steel option she can switch between so that is also awesome that she can choose between the 2 styles. Very easy to clean since circumference wise, they are slightly wider than a regular plastic straw. I also love they contribute to charity with taking care of our oceans! These straws were a perfect win!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very short and thin,  not recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Description says extra long n fits 20+ oz... There is NO possible way. The straws fit at most 12-14 oz if u don't want to keep trying to find it inside your cup/bottle. Also, the stainless steel straws r very thin, half the width if a normal straw, so don't bother! I would not recommend this set of straws at all. The silicone straws r still short but at least normal width.... Just don't expect to drink a thick smoothie thru any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Marlissee

customer_reviews.title: Great product, amazing company!
customer_reviews.text: I love my silicone straws! Not only did they come with 2 metal ones, it also has 2 brush cleaners and a travel bag! I encourage everyone to buy these and help reduce the plastic waste. The silicone are great for my grandkids when we're out. It's easy on their little teeth and teaches them to be responsible humans. Thank you for what you do! :)
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Bright and fun. Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: The colored straws are very flexible- pure silicone. There are two stainless straws in the batch too. They provided a cleaning tool too, which is convenient. The colors are very bright and fun.
customer_reviews.author: LID0409

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: We started using straws more and was thrilled with the cleaning brushes and the way they fit every cup and can we tried them in with the reusability of them. The stainless steel ones I haven't figured out how to clean with the brushes but haven't found a problem since they seem to rinse out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: DP Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of these straws! They are very similar to a normal drinking straw. The colors are vibrant and I loved the variety. It’s also convenient that it comes with brushes to clean them and the nice storage pouch. I bought these for a gift and I think I’m going to have to get more for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Dislike : The hole is that of a regular straw. in the picture I saw, looked larger and I believed it said was good for smoothies. Likes: Environmentally friendly , they come in different colors, are sturdy, so far easy to clean ,and I would give them a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: No more having to buy and throw away straws! My 3 kids would go through a whole pack of straws a day (because you know, no different drink can have the same straw) so i bit the bullet to try these! Pleasantly surprised with how great it is! it even comes with 2 straw cleaners so i dont have to worry about it getting moldy or trying to find different ways to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Angellia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Very colorful (strong colors), very soft yet feels strong, plus two “metal” ones, all packed very nice. A step closer to saving the planet - avoid non-reusable straws. Pleased, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Just a few changes...Good thought
customer_reviews.text: I think the product is nice. I typically use stainless steel straws, and I find these need to be a little bit longer. I do like the silicone straws if the length were a little bit longer on a 20 oz cup it would be fine but advertising on a 30 oz cup they're not quite long enough
customer_reviews.author: Ian Aiuto

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Love the vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to this reusable straw thing, but originally bought them for my one year old who LOVES to drink out of a straw. I keep a few in her diaper bag so we have them on hand when we are out and about. So far I am satisfied with the quality. I have tried stainless steel straws an just am not a fan. I am hoping we love the silicon ones much better!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable straws!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The included brushes make cleaning easy, they are durable, and have helped me cut way back on my use of disposable straws. My toddler is learning to drink through a straw, and these are good and the flexibility make them safe for him to use as well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gay N.

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: I one year old simply loves the straw, he likes drinking in adult glass rather then his sippy cup and he knows where I keep them straws I have a whole buch of different straw but he like these kind I think he likes the different colors on them everyday he pick different color and as for me I love the metal straw i noticed it keeps my drink cooler for longer period of time
customer_reviews.author: RRathod

customer_reviews.title: No more munched on looking straws!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad we are finally able to throw away all our munched on straws! Before handing these to my toddlers, I soaked them in boiling water just to make sure I got rid of all the unseen nasties inside when they were made (and to make sure they aren't fake "silicone") Glad to say they held up well. My toddlers drank more water today cause they couldn't resist the straw colors. I put one each in their water bottles and they fold right in. Very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Skuh

customer_reviews.title: Nice straws as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice straws. Variable assortment. My son likes the stainless steel straws but they can be cold. He put the silicone on the outside of the ss and uses them together. Easy to clean. Comes with a storage bag. Would be nice if there were also an individual straw storage case. Had them several months. Seem durable. No more disposable straws for us.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: #savetheturtles2k19
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The bag is super convenient to keep all the straws in and they clean up super well. Unfortunately though three of the straws had puncture holes in them and I cannot use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lea Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great straws
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for travel, they even came in their own pouch, they are easy to clean, but I like the stainless straws better than the silicone, even tap water is crisp and fresh in the stainless straws. The silicone straws have a larger opening and are good for smoothies and shakes but they are soft and can't use them to stir.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these straws. We drink a lot of smoothies and frozen drinks and they work so nicely, if you are using the silicone ones I would advise making sure you have blended everything nice and smoothly otherwise chunks do get stuck but that’s what the metal straw is for!! I love that it comes with two cleaner brushes and a cute little bag so you can take them with you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: eco-friendly and well priced
customer_reviews.text: I've been really trying to cut out one time use products and am happy there are cheap alternatives. My 2 1/2 year old loves the colored straws- I personally prefer the steel ones. I'm not sure if over time there will be more buildup/harder to clean (I'll update if I notice that), but for now they're great..
customer_reviews.author: Stacey R.

customer_reviews.title: Makes the turtles happy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and helps the environment. The colors are bright and they come with two of each color. Totally worth the money. My only gripe is I love the metal straws but they are too small to drink a milkshake from. I would deffo recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and value for every household
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of colors in this pack and the straws are a perfect size. They fit in my tumbler cups perfectly! The cleaning brushes are easy to use and get the job done. Very pleased and will be able to keep some at home and at work.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Good and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly like the picture. I really like that it came with cleansers so I can use them over and over again without having to worry about them being dirty. The coffee shop at my work sells coffee with paper straws and the straw always break off in the middle of my drink so I think I’ll bring these to work with me more often!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: perfect for milk shakes and smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: These straws are thick, which I love for drinking smoothies and milkshakes! They are also easy to clean and come in a nice storage bag. Arriving in a set of 10 allowed me to share a few with co-workers who were interested in trying them. It feels good to make a small dent in reducing the amount of plastic I use.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Items arrived on time and are as described
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright colors of these straws, and the metal straws are a plus. The silicone straws are nicely made and fit nicely in my insulated water cup. The brushes that came with them are a bonus, as I won't have to hunt around for something to clean them with. Overall, very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jardinera

customer_reviews.title: Reusable Silicone Drinking Straws
customer_reviews.text: I love these straws!! I have sensitive teeth so cold drinks are not easy to drink. But these straws do the job. I haven't had them long enough to see how well they hold up but I think with hand washing it will be awhile! The handy little pouch they come in makes it easy to put them in my purse when I go out. Love that it is keeping all the straws out of the landfills and oceans.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The 12 pack silicone straws (plus 2 stainless) work well. They’re the perfect size for adults and kids. The bend is great for all cups and they fit nicely in all size tervis. My only complaint is the bend in the stainless makes it harder to clean. The silicone ones you can bend and force along the cleaning wand with ease to clean the spot but I worry about the stainless ones.
customer_reviews.author: Labra

customer_reviews.title: So cute though!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I love these straws they're so cute! Such fun colors! Great deal and quality for the price. Now we don't have to be asking who does this drink belong to. I love that I get the best of both worlds silicone and metal without having to make separate purchases. It's basically a starter kit!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Love the variety of materials and colors
customer_reviews.text: Love these straws for my smaller tumblers. Also use in my big Yeti. I love the variety of materials and colors. I especially like the silicone because it is flexible. I have bopped my mouth on stainless ones I’ve purchased in the past. One to match every cup! Includes brush that makes cleaning easy. Best straws I’ve purchased yet.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: This product arrive on time and as described. They straws are a good length, not too long like some other brands. It’s nice that they have included 2 stainless steel straws as well as 2 straw cleaners. The canvas carrying bag is nice too. Will definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sarah Wenbourne

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love the silicone straws! Such a great price however I had a hard time getting the straw down if there was already ice in my glass. If I had to change anything I would make the straws a thicker plastic. I did take one of the silicone straws and cut it and put it on top of the metal straw and it worked like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: lmcarter

customer_reviews.title: Silicone is better for your teeth
customer_reviews.text: For most reusable straws they are easy to clean. I like these ones because silicone is better for your teeth than metal anyways. This one comes with straw cleaners which is helpful because some packages don’t. I’m not sure it’s worthy of its price since you can buy them much cheaper on eBay but they are nice and brightly colored.
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Plus the $ goes to cleaning up the ocean!
customer_reviews.text: In Vermont, they are starting to ban plastic straws.. so I went ahead and ordered this set. They came in a bag to keep them in and pipe cleaners for easy cleaning. The silicone ones do not taste plastic-y at all, which is great. When I got them, it said that if you write a review, the proceeds go to cleaning up the oceans! Talk about a win-win situation.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to be a part of the desire to be more responsible to our wonderful earth. Every step is necessary and using this product is certainly one of them. I really liked that this bundle came with 2 types of materials for the straws and 2 brushes to clean them. Plus the container to hold them. I carry 2 in my purse to use when I'm out and about. They arrived in a timely fashion and I can't wait to use them. Quality is perfect, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Frances Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the metal straws
customer_reviews.text: The (2) metal straws are great, I don't really like the feel of the other straws. The pipe cleaner that comes with the straws is freaking great. Not only do they work on my straws but I also use it for my baby bottle bits.
customer_reviews.author: Tulsi R.

customer_reviews.title: Go GREEN!
customer_reviews.text: Our theatre went green and stopped serving straws, so it was time for us to go green. A little strange to the mouth at first. I bought a medium drink which seemed more like a large and the straw reached to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqui A. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good for at home use or on the go
customer_reviews.text: These are great for use at home or on the go since they come with a neat bag to carry them in. It also comes with a brush to clean out the insides and they are dishwasher safe! I recommend cleaning them with the brush prior to dishwasher cleaning though if you're using them for more than water. Overall, I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SunKun

customer_reviews.title: I like my colorful reusable straws
customer_reviews.text: They are great for the environment and with the brush they can be cleaned but it’s a little time consuming. I don't know how they hold up because I just got them. Would definitely recommend from an environmental POV. Colors are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This review helps save the ocean!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a week and am very pleased! I like that it came with both metal and sillicone straws. It also has two cleaning brushes, which I think will be helpful - I'm interested to see how long they last because they seem like they could be flimsy? They work great now, though. Would definitely recommend and LOVE that writing this review means 100% of the proceeds from my order will go to OCEANA - a nonprofit dedicated to preserving oceans.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Metal Gets cold
customer_reviews.text: Seems obvious, but the metal will get surprisingly cold with smoothies. But that is where the silicon options come in handy. I am pretty excited to stop using plastic straws. super convenient that the scrub brushes come in the pack. If i would have know such a cheap and convenient set of reusable straws was available, i would have stopped using single use straws years ago.
customer_reviews.author: El miguel

customer_reviews.title: Slimmer size for my cups.
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than ones I previously bought from another company. They aren’t as thick silicone wise, but they are a slimmer straw that fits into my cups better. They also come with a cleaning brush.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home. I purchased these because I wanted stares for iced coffee without buying plastic straws. I use the silicone ones everyday, and best way to clean them is letting them soak in warm soapy water for awhile. Weird smell only when I first received them but went away after washing. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: One suggestion
customer_reviews.text: I love the reusable straws. One recommendation for the future is that in the pouch to put the straws that you create a another separate pouch for used straws so we can keep them separate and wash them when we get home.
customer_reviews.author: bee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: The straw is a little long for my yeti cup, but it doesn't bother me. These straws are great! I tend to bite the end of my straw when I drink, and so far the silicone ones haven't had any damage. I love that they're dishwasher safe! I recommend getting these!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Straws
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the straws yesterday, arrived at my door before 9 am the next day. Great straws. I like that there are both silicone and stainless steel straws. I also like the carrying pouch. Will be able to keep in my bag now so I don't need to get a plastic straw. Using the straw now in my medium Dunkin Donuts Iced coffee and it is a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: jay9ko

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they arent hard plastic like some of them, so they dont break if you drop your cup. They come in a bag I can throw in my purse for the family and the cleaning brushes are super helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Best straws ever
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for the perfect reusable straws and I found it. It's also a bonus that they include 2 stainless steel straws. They are easy to clean and are durable. I also enjoy the colors. They also don't have a weird taste when drinking like paper straws. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: maryam

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for reusable straws that would fit into the hole of my insulated cup and that was sturdy enough to get through the ice. The stainless steel straws were perfect. I also like the silicone straws. The brushes that come with the kit make it easy to clean the straws. I kinda wish they were a little bit wider so I can get more liquid through them, but I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Pretty stellar!
customer_reviews.text: I really like using these so far. I thought that the silicone might make the beverage taste a little off, but it really does not have too much of an effect. The silicone ones are very flexible which is nice but is something to get used to if you usually use metal or more sturdy plastic prior to these. I would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Blair

customer_reviews.title: A perfect alternative to plastic straws
customer_reviews.text: I love these straws! They are a perfect alternative to plastic straws and you can use them over and over again. They even came with a travel case and a little cleaning brush. I really like them all, but prefer the stainless steel straws over the silicone. I would recommend these straws.
customer_reviews.author: JeanieD

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger than I’m used to....
customer_reviews.text: But once I got used to their larger size in my mouth, I realized I liked having something just a little bit larger. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Good straws
customer_reviews.text: I love the straws, they work great. The cute little cleaning brushes are useless. They are too large for the straws diameter but I don’t really need them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dabbs

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving these so far. I haven’t used them with thicker liquids yet however so i can’t comment on that. But i like the feel of them. Soft and flexible. They come well packaged and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: R Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are great! The colorful ones are foldable to fit for traveling. They are good for hot or cold drinks. They will not close on you while drinking your liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Rosio Mujica

customer_reviews.title: Great straws!
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for the metal straws because they are too hard but the silicone ones are great!! They are easy to clean and since they are flexible they are easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable
customer_reviews.text: Love that there are sturdier straws, and the silicone ones too! Great set for great price. The cleaning brushes are an awesome touch! My 1 and 3 year old are obsessed with straws. These will keep our waste down! I am so excited over the bright colors amd the carrying package to keep them all in!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E

customer_reviews.title: Great for the environment!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these straws! The color of the silicone straws are so vibrant and fun! I really enjoy that they have a slight curve to them kind of like a standard bendy straw would have. The stainless steel straws are very nice and sleek looking. I love the handy carrying case and the little cleaning brushes provided. Overtime these straws will save money vs. had spent money buying straws you just throw away. On top of that these are great for the environment!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie p.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughter in law for the grandkids. She loves them. She had been looking for them but couldn't find a set like this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Straws!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for paper straw alternatives and these are perfect! I love how many colors are in the pack as well as the silicone and metal options.
customer_reviews.author: Jess S

customer_reviews.title: Great for little teeth
customer_reviews.text: I love that it comes with the pouch and the cleaning brush, I got these for my kids and they love it, I've been using them for a month or so and even though they are flexible, they are sturdy enough for little biting teeth. I would compare the material to the baby bottle nipples
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Survives my kids and they love them!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them! Love that they come with a little brush for cleaning. The stainless steel straws have a weird metallic taste so we don’t use them much.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: 💜
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the hard plastic straws for years and have a bad habit of cracking them. Now that is one less thing I have to worry about!!! Love these straws and all the colors. Totally would recommend these for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Service
customer_reviews.text: Service was OUTSTANDING. One metal straw was bent and it was the replaced the very next day. Love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Arnesarmy

customer_reviews.title: Mostly okay
customer_reviews.text: I think this a great set. I would have given 5 stars if the set included a couple of straws with a wider opening for thicker liquids. I had a hard time using it with my morning smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mom

customer_reviews.title: Rather flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The metal straws are fine, but the plastic ones are so flimsy that they are difficult to actually drink out of. I'd not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl F

customer_reviews.title: Great for straw chewers
customer_reviews.text: I just throw them in the dishwasher after scrubbing them with the cleaner thing (& soap) and it works well. I love throwing them in their bag & into my purse. They’re great for those of us who chew on their straws a bit.
customer_reviews.author: A Siscoe

customer_reviews.title: Durable, not a textural nightmare, wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much! I bought a variety because I wanted to try both silicone and metal. The brush is perfect. I would recommend washing before use, some had some black residue inside. The only downside is that it was shipped in 3 layers of plastic waste.
customer_reviews.author: Rayanne Holton

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love these straws. I have a problem bending to reach my straw so these bend to me. I’m so glad that someone came out with these flexible straws for people like me.
customer_reviews.author: Donna McNevin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the cruise and I haven't stopped using them since. I'm not the biggest fan of the metal ones. They hurt my teeth. I mainly use those for cocktails that need to be stirred. My tumbler is never without the softer ones though. Easy to clean. Really enjoy using them.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Narie

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: The metal straws are easy to clean the rubber ones tend to be a little more of a task but they fit in the cup lids nicely and are lots of fun! Adore them and I'll keep using them daily!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect straws
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed!! I used to use the metal straw but lemon seeds kept getting stuck in them!! These make it so much easier to get the seeds out!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Threlkeld

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors. Have only used one so far & it worked just fine. They are made of silicone so are soft & pliable.
customer_reviews.author: C. McDyer

customer_reviews.title: Machine Washable
customer_reviews.text: I love these straws! Both the silicon and the metal are great. I love that they are machine washable and that they came with two lil brushes and a storage bag
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Replace those disposable straws!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great option to replace plastic disposable drinking straws! This set comes with a large amount of different colors as well as two stainless steel ones. Comes with two cleaning tools and a bag to store everything in.
customer_reviews.author: Pendragon1977

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety
customer_reviews.text: The straws came in the mail yesterday. They seem nice and durable but I can’t really judge since I haven’t used them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Plastic Straws!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative to plastic straws, and I found these! They are very easy to clean (comes with 2 brushes for hand washing or you can put in dishwasher). I have only used the silicone ones so far, but they haven’t stained (even in fruit punch), are the perfect length, don’t have a weird taste, and they come in a variety of fun colors! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these straws!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag to contain them, two bristle brushes to clean them and a mix of silicon and steel! These are easy to clean and sanitary. Enough said!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement for disposables
customer_reviews.text: All items arrived as pictured. I love the silicone straws and cleaning brushes. I haven’t tried the metal ones yet, just don’t think I’d prefer them but I’m keeping them in case I find a situation where I might need a sturdier straw. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye C. Wise

customer_reviews.title: A bit too flexible
customer_reviews.text: Good silicone, small inside diameter is perfect. Only bad thing is they are not rigid enough Making it difficult to push through a tumbler with a lot of ice.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis McG

customer_reviews.title: good  purchase
customer_reviews.text: i bought these to cut down on waste. i keep the two metal straws in my car. and the rubber ones at home. they work great. these straws are a bit short but will still work with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: You must order these straws. Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Quality products. Love that we will be helping our environment by using these wonderful straws and cleaning brushes. Very unique carrying bag provided for travel. Recommend these to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.  Facemire

product_meta.title: Reusable Silicone Drinking Straws - 12 Pieces Drinking Straws & Metal Stainless Steel Straws Bundle - 30oz and 20oz tumblers compatible Extra Long for Yeti/Rtic/Ozark by PINE KITCHEN CO
feature_bullets: ✅ Premium materials- Made of food-grade silicone and BPA-free
✅ REGULAR SIZE - These high-quality Reusable Straws are great for tumblers, smoothies, milkshakes - Modern and sleek design for kids and more!
✅ SUITABLE FOR ANY KIND OF TUMBLERS - Use with your favorite RTIC, Tervis, YETI 20oz or 30 oz
✅ EASY TO CLEAN - Dishwasher safe AND comes with a cleaning brush!
✅ INCLUDES 8 SILICONE STRAWS, 2 STAINLESS STEEL METAL STRAWS, 2 CLEANING BRUSHES AND CARRYING BAG!
